Title: Sex with a Smile
Writer: Tonino Guerra, Sergio Martino, Giorgio Salvioni
Actors: Barbara Bouchet, Edwige Fenech, Dayle Haddon
Plot: Five short comic sketches, all unrelated to each other, except that they are all expressions of Italian sexual humor. In one sketch, Marty Feldman plays a bodyguard, hired by her father to watch a young woman; he watches her a lit...
